summary: This document is a chain of forwarded emails from September 2020, originating from an individual identifying as a longtime victim of Jeffrey Epstein. The individual is seeking to contact a victim specialist to inquire about their rights to victim services or referrals. The email is forwarded through FBI and victim services channels.

persons.name: Mandy
persons.context: Mentioned in the cc field of an internal FBI email forwarding the victim's request.

events.title: Victim seeks specialist assistance
events.description: An individual identifying as a longtime Jeffrey Epstein victim sends an email seeking to speak to a victim specialist regarding their rights to services or referrals.

keyFacts: An individual identifies themselves as a 'longtime Jeffrey Epstein victim' in a September 2020 email.
The victim is seeking assistance from a victim specialist to understand their rights to services or referrals.
The request is forwarded through official channels, including the FBI and a VictimServices email address.
The document shows victim outreach and service coordination was ongoing years after Epstein's death.
